requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              English Level: Must be able to communicate and read in English
              
              + Job Skills:
              
              • Male, female
              
              • Degree in Engineering (specialized in Mechanical/Automation)
              
              • Priority will be given to those with more than 3 years of experience in the field of mechanical engineering design.
              
              - Ability to read and understand technical drawings.
              
              • Proficiency in Autocad and Inventor design software
              
              • Proficient in office software;
              
              • Understanding of machining technology, machine building, automation
              
              - Ability to work in team, creative thinking, careful and persistent
              
              • Fun, honest, agile, enthusiastic, good communication.
              

              Work environment:
              
              • A professional, dynamic and friendly working environment.
              
              •	Work location: Ha Noi, Ho Chi Minh (Accepting candidates to work online).
              
              • Management has the vision and encourages employees to develop sustainably with the company.
              

              * Benefits:
              
              • High salary according to agreement and personal ability.
              
              • Be able to work for European businesses, trained in English language.
              
              • Have the opportunity to be trained to improve their professional skills (domestic and foreign) and develop their capacity.
              
              • Free lunch allowance for employees.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
